Introduction
This topic contains other development procedures for IU claims, including
when to obtain Social Security Administration (SSA) records in IU claims
when to obtain vocational rehabilitation/employment (VR&E) records in IU claims
, and
considering IU claims for National Guard and reservists
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B - Individual Unemployability (IU) Claims Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
